outline:
1. uprising, utterance, burden, portion, uplifting
    1. that which rises, uprising, uplifting, signal, rising
    2. utterance, oracle
    3. burden
    4. portion, present, largesse, gift, contribution, offering, tribute
kjv_def: burden, collection, sign of fire, (great) flame, gift, lifting up, mess, oblation, reward.
strongs_def: properly, (abstractly) a raising (as of the hands in prayer), or rising (of flame); figuratively, an utterance; concretely, a beacon (as raised); a present (as taken), mess, or tribute; figuratively, a reproach (as a burden)
